body.name: Furologee Computer Desk with Shelves and Drawer, 61" Long Desk with Fabric File Drawer, Industrial Writing Desk with Large Monitor Stand, Study Table Workstation for Home Office, Rustic Brown

features: [Large Desk for Ample Storage Space]: 61.3" long desktop can accommodate 2 displays and one printer, providing sufficient space for home office work; 3 open storage shelves, one fabric file cabinet and drawer increase additional space to meet different storage requirements for making your desktop more organized.

[Flexible Desk Shelves]: The large computer desk has 2-tier shelves, the middle board is adjustable, according to your preference, installing it in the upper hole to make room for large computer tower; The bottom board is fixed on metal bars to ensure the desk's bearing capacity.

[Desk with FABRIC File Cabinet]: The multifunctional desk is equipped with a FABRIC file cabinet; the open shelf and the drawer allow you palce printer or storage your small objects; Place your LETTER/A4 SIZE FILES in the bottom cabinet to prevent documents from falling into dust.

[Long Stand for Dual Monitor]: The size of the monitor stand is 44.5"*7.8", it can meet your requirements for placing 2 monitors. The monitor shelf can easily raise the screen to the level parallel to the eyes, promote good posture, more ergonomic design, and effectively reduce the pressure on the neck and back.

[Comfortable and Sturdy Desk]: 33" legroom design, and the inner metal bar can support your feet, allowing you to maintain a comfortable state when working. The writing desk made of high-quality E1 particleboard, which is scratch resistant, waterproof and easy to clean. 8 adjustable foot can not only protect your floor from scratches, but also ensure stability on uneven ground.

[Easy to Assemble and Satisfying Service]: The size of the computer desk: 61.3"L x 18.9"D x 33.2"H; Detailed instructions and labeled parts for easily and quickly assemble. Furologee provides customer service before and after purchase. If your items received are damaged, scratched or missing parts, please contact us at any time, and we will provide you with satisfactory solutions within 24 hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Came in on time and love it
reviews.reviewText: It’s a very nifty and sturdy desk. The instructions were simple and work out perfectly if you follow each step. The built in plugs and lights make it very comfy for gaming setups and such. The desktop also has a really good smooth surface that makes mouse pads unnecessary. I also have 2 fairly heavy monitors that have no problem mounting onto the top area of the desk. Very good GGs

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice desk!
reviews.reviewText: This desk came next day… it was extremely easy to assemble. My daughter and I put it together in less than an hour. The instructions were clear to understand and all the parts were labeled, it also came with all the tools needed to assemble. It was very easy to put together. I think this was definitely a great deal and more than worth the price. For the price the quality really was better than I expected it to be. I am very pleased with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived with all pieces intact, labeled, and included a bag of extra parts. Item can be assembled with drawers on right or left of main desk space. Assembly was easy, and took about 30 - 45 minutes. Instructions demonstrate an image of how parts connect vs step by step, so make sure you read carefully which size screw to use.Final product works well for my family member. The top shelf holds a large monitor a laptop, hub, cellphone and a light (it is sized well). Desk surface space is fine, and the LED under lighting is nice. Desk seems sturdy enough, no issues with quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I've bought other cheap, lightweight furniture on Amazon and the quality is usually pretty low, so that's what I expected from this desk. It is exceeding expectations so far. It was pretty easy to assemble. It took me about 90 minutes to do alone. Everything fit together precisely - it wasn't one of those experiences where you struggle to get the last screw in because the holes weren't perfectly drilled. There was one manufacturing error - one of the metal pieces to attach the monitor shelf didn't have a hole drilled in it. Since this was only one of six attachment points for the shelf, it is still plenty secure without that bolt. The only other issue is that the adhesive on the light strip is not sticking on the end with the cable.The fabric drawers are so much better than expected. I've had other furniture with these where you had to hold up the bottom of the drawer while pulling them out or they would fall. These move just like regular drawers, but even better because they don't have any stops that prevent you from pulling them all the way out. They feel very sturdy.I wanted a desk with more storage than this one, but couldn't find anything. I resolved this by buying one monitor stand with drawers to put under my printer on the desk and a smaller one to put on the shelf above the fabric drawers.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this desk as I am starting a new work-from-home job and need the desk space. I received this desk within a week from ordering, and we put together the same day it was delivered. It was very easy to assemble and it comes with (small) tools to help screw everything together. It seems sturdy, and will worth the price. It doesn't feel cheap and fits in with our home decor. Definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Value & Utility
reviews.reviewText: The product was easy to assemble, does everything I need it to do, & it's surprisingly sturdy given the cost. It's very light, so I can move it to clean or do other things with it. My only issue is that the drawers are fabric. The sticker for the light system couldn't be removed very easily, so part of it doesn't stick to the wood very well. A good product for good value.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Setting up office space in my home and the desk fit perfectly. It was easy to assemble and it looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Value Desk with a Few Caveats
reviews.reviewText: This desk is a reliable choice, especially considering the price point. It boasts an attractive aesthetic and delivers decent functionality. Between my partner and I, we took about 45-60 minutes to assemble the desk. I must admit that I have only two primary complaints, and I recognize they are largely my fault for not reading the product description more closely.Firstly, the drawers are constructed with a lower quality fabric, which may not hold up as well over time. Secondly, the desk itself is slightly shallower than I expected. However, aside from these two issues, I'm genuinely satisfied with my purchase. It's a great value overall.
